replies.msg: My friend peter is a Scorpio. He's been having a crush on this girl named Jo for eight years but Jo has a boyfriend. His friend said "I don't blame you. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him to dieget her. She's just not worth it. His mum said "you'll be better off without her" His uncle too said "you would be better off without her" Peter works as an accounting manager at Hilton but if he takes the job in big 4 he'll be four thousand dollars a month better off but he's still better off now than he was two years ago when he was working below everybody else in the department. He thinks a junior accountant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CPA exam two years ago he wouldn't be working as a manager now. He's a sci-fi fan. He said "if scientists really would invent a starship I eiukd quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" His sister recently married her high school sweetheart. Her father felt she was marrying beneath her though. Her uncle feels her husband was beneath her too. She enjoys socializing with the better off. Three months ago Peter was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After the trio I said "if you should go there again can you get me a pack of white liver chocolate please?" Peter is a computer expert. His cousin has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but he's having problems with his computer. If peter will go and fix his computer he'll be so thankful for his help. He also has exams next Monday so he's better off revising at home over the weekend. Pete is a kickboxing fan. His favourite fighter Dan recently won his retirement fight. He's deeply grateful to his coaches and thankful that he got a job as a colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans wanna see randy versus Fred. If Fred would sign a contract with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. When randy was reading the terms and conditions of the contract dana's assistant said "if you would just sign here please" Pete's brother works as a concierge in a hotel. I said "if it'll make you feel better I'll come to stay for a night as company for you while your colleagues are away" He gave a house party recently. His television is cheap and nasty. As some of us wanted to watch the news I said "if I could turn the television on please" He then said "sure. If you would switch to the news"
